run.methoddescription: - Color based segmentation of macro images - Some user interaction on natural background images - Morphological Descriptors on leaves - Color+Texture features on fruits, flowers and barks - Entire plants and non-macro images untreated - Naive classifcation - Individual-based fusion - Geography likelihood using synthetic geographical prameters (France only)
run.otherinformation: No geographical data on flower species, and even some tree species which may lead to fairly wrong results.
